description:
How can your solution solve challenges faced by the city? 
How can the city become your client? 
At “Scaling with the city” you will explore needs and pain-points of the city and understand the stakeholders involved in the city environment. 
You’ll be able to deconstruct your solution by analysing your technology under a new perspective, oriented to the city as a customer. 
You’ll understand challenges and needs faced by Porto, so you can identify real opportunities for your company in the city. 
This workshop will apply a service design approach with collaborative methods based on design thinking methodology and takes advantage of the experience of the facilitators on working with innovation projects in the city. “Scaling with the city” is promoted by Porto Digital, together with Porto Design Accelerator and Porto Design Factory. 
Who is this workshop for? 
Startups willing to explore the city as a potential customer. Join as a team in a maximum of 3 people per group. 
Places are limited to 8 startups.
name: Scaling with the city
